#导入包

```{r}
library(pacman)
p_load(reader,
       readxl,
       openxlsx,
       tidyverse,
       dplyr,
       tidyr,
       ggplot2,
       ggthemes,
       ggsci,
       ggprism,
       patchwork
)
```

#读取数据

```{r echo=FALSE}
lm1 <- read.xlsx("~/desktop/AA.xlsx")
str(lm) #解构数据集
```

# 玫瑰图

```{r}
   ggplot(data = lm) +
   aes(x = Team, y = HIRD) + 
   geom_bar(stat = "identity", alpha = 0.7) + 
   coord_polar()
```

# 甜甜圈图

```{r}
  ggplot(data = lm) + 
  aes(x = Team, y = HIRD) +
  geom_col() +
  coord_polar(theta = "y") 

```

# 饼图

```{r}
  ggplot(data = lm) + 
  aes(x = Team, y = HIRD) +
  geom_bar(width = 1, stat = 'identity') +
  coord_polar("y", start = 0)

```
